game.name: Buttons Up!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Buttons Up! is a incremental button collecting game where you hoard Buttons and keep them safe from stealing intruders. Get those Buttons Up by buying buildings, using skills and by automating your income.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Buttons Up! is a incremental button collecting game where you hoard Buttons and keep them safe from stealing intruders. Get those Buttons Up by buying buildings, using skills and by automating your income.
